publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-1206# Dr Elaine Murray: Harestanes Wind Farm Planning Application-That the Parliament notes with concern Scottish Power's planning application to erect 94 wind turbines, each 411 feet high, in the Forest of Ae in Dumfries and Galloway; further notes that this is one of several industrial-scale wind farm planning applications in the region, and believes that a public inquiry should be held in advance of the determination of this application by Scottish Ministers.
S2M-1206# Harestanes Wind Farm Planning Application (lodged on 26 April 2004) Dr Jean Turner*, Ms Rosemary Byrne*
S2M-1206# Harestanes Wind Farm Planning Application (lodged on 26 April 2004) David Mundell*

S2M-1206# Dr Elaine Murray: Harestanes Wind Farm Planning Application-That the Parliament notes with concern Scottish Power's planning application to erect 94 wind turbines, each 411 feet high, in the Forest of Ae in Dumfries and Galloway; further notes that this is one of several industrial-scale wind farm planning applications in the region, and believes that a public inquiry should be held in advance of the determination of this application by Scottish Ministers. Supported by: Dr Jean Turner, Ms Rosemary Byrne, David Mundell
S2M-1206# Harestanes Wind Farm Planning Application (lodged on 26 April 2004) Phil Gallie*
S2M-1206# Harestanes Wind Farm Planning Application (lodged on 26 April 2004) Frances Curran*
